1419470.name: Invisible Wings: Chapter One Soundtrack
1419470.description:
Listen to the soundtrack of Invisible Wings: Chapter One and indulge yourself in the beautiful and fantastic world. Carefully hand-crafted by Danae Dekker, the composer and developer of the game, this soundtrack features tracks that can be heard in the first chapter of Invisible Wings.

Files are available in 320kbps MP3 format, as well as high-quality FLAC format.
